meta.name: 異人組合 DUO Production
meta.about:
DUO Production is a Hong Kong based multimedia production house. Founded by a duo - Richmond Tong and Wisely Chan, we are professional in wedding event photography and videography, wedding emcee, wedding live band etc. We also involve in commercial video production and short movie . Please feel free to reach us if you need a service quotation.
